message: Fixed item name on goods receipts and added custom fields to line item #10930
Removed 'inactive' button and show inactive items at the bottom in gray instead #10833
Improved 'Copy to' function so discounts are copied over too #10776
Added in-built tax codes for India #11001
Fixed bug when feeding spreadsheet with duplicate column names into batch update
Gracefully handle date input when entering year with more than 4 digits
Fixed inventory issue when delivering inventory kits #11085
When exporting reports, negative amounts to be prefixed with hyphen-minus instead of minus sign #10957
Fixed issue when cash account is marked as inactive, not to show it as a choice for new transactions #11156
Removed option to show custom field as a column for receipts and payments as this hasn't been implemented yet #11002
Fixed PayPal import so gross amount and fee amount are split correctly across both receipts and payments #10819
Improved the look of the textbox which contains exported table or rows for batch update operation
Removed batch operation buttons on exchange rates as this feature hasn't been implemented yet #8946
Renamed column 'Cleared balance' to 'Statement balance' under 'Bank Accounts' tab
Added 'Uncategorized' column to 'Bank Accounts' tab to see number of uncategorized transactions (if applicable)
Moved 'Bank Reconciliation' from 'Reports' tab to 'Bank Accounts' tab as a column
Added 3 new tabs in relation to bank & cash accounts #11468
Reference numbers on cash transactions are now automatically generated #10166
Increased font size in the left navigation if language is set to Chinese for better readability
Added 'Contact' column on 'Cash Transactions' and 'Bank Transactions' tabs
When bank/cash account is not selected on bank/cash transaction, the transaction will be posted to 'Suspense' account instead of being ignored
If due date on invoice is not specified, assume due date is on the same date as issue date of the invoice
Improved automatic credit allocations for invoices #11575
Fixed layout issue when copying invoice to recurring invoice with billable expense #11507
Fixed attachment issue where users with read-only access were able to upload or delete attachments #11489
Added 'Convert' button to 'Bank Accounts' and 'Cash Accounts' tab to convert accounts from bank to cash and vice versa
Added 'Payslip Earnings Summary' report to get totals for individual payslip earnings items by employee
Fixed 'Amount in words' on invoices for Rupees if amount is less than 100
Amount in words on invoices to show subdivision of Indian rupee (Indian paisa)
Reference numbers for journal entries, expense claims and inter-account transfers are now automatically generated
Fixed ambiguity issue when setting up date format on dates when day digit is the same as month digit #11661
Reintroduced buttons 'Receive money' and 'Spend money' under 'Bank Accounts' and 'Cash Accounts' tabs when drilling-down to transaction list
Added tooltips when left navigation is collapsed #9822
Renamed 'Priority' field to 'Reference' field which is now automatically generated on 'Production Orders'
Improved the look when viewing inventory kits
Added ability to create a budget for individual tracking codes
Added ability to open Manager files from anywhere without importing when using desktop edition #11921
Fixed issue where it wasn't possible to attach multiple files at once when using Mac #11627
Fixed error message when attempting to open Manager file directly on Mac #11937
Invoice to have 'Tax Invoice' title when using GST 6% tax code in Maldives #9983
Fixed default custom fields not showing for bank and cash transactions #11992
Fixed bank statement importing issue when date column in CSV file contained unrecognized character #11998
Added ability to set tracking codes on bank rules #9532
Fixed crashing issue when trying to generate recurring sales invoice which has interval set to zero #12009
Added ability to 'reverse signs' on Capital Accounts Summary report #11968
Fixed multi-currency issue where foreign exchange gains or losses could be posted incorrectly to suspense account #12018
Make bank rules compatible with custom control accounts #9532
Added two new tax codes for Pakistan #12132
Added ability to create, update or delete exchange rates in batch #8946
Fixed bank rule issue where some account names didn't show if they had a code #12161
Added ability to create custom fields for 'Folders' tab #12215
Added new VAT tax code for users in Saudi Arabia #12135
When using Pakistan tax codes, automatically rename invoice title to 'Sales Tax Invoice'
When drilling-down through figures under `Summary` tab, show running total as debit or credit balance
Fixed unit name issue on inventory kits so they show on invoices, quotes, orders and other documents #12344
Added ability to set withholding tax on recurring sales invoices #12362
Added 'GST 0%' and 'GST Exempt' tax codes for New Zealand #12348
Fixed issue when cash summary report was not visible if only 'Cash Accounts' tab was enabled #12427
When installing Manager on Windows, added ability to uncheck shortcut creation #12386
The item count on tabs in the left navigation not to include inactive items #12430
If using custom control accounts for inventory items, show 'Control Account' column under 'Inventory Items' tab #8741
Fixed starting balance issue for bank accounts and cash accounts #12470
Added VAT 5% tax code for United Arab Emirates #12070
Fixed width of audit trail screen #12428
Show customer or supplier for delivery notes and goods receipts when drilling-down into qty figures #12487
Prevent ability to delete tracking code if it has been already used in one or more transactions #12533
Added VAT 0% tax code for United Arab Emirates and make invoice title show 'Tax Invoice' if code used #12070
Fixed inventory transfer view so item name is shown if description is empty #12734
Fixed 'Sales Invoice Totals by Customer' report so it doesn't include starting balances #12760
Added ability to hide total amount on sales quotes #9208
Added ability to create custom fields for 'Inter Account Transfers' tab #12771
Added ability to clone inter account transfers #10578
Fixed PDF generator issue when column names were too long #12783
Added ability to mark amounts on bank transactions and cash transaction as tax-exclusive #9230
Fixed customer statements so custom fields don't appear twice #12842
Prevent custom fields from deleting if they are in use #12864
Fixed PDF generator so it doesn't break the words in the middle if there isn't enough space #12783
Fixed chart of accounts so that if group is allocated to itself, it will be shown under 'Uncategorized' #12885
Adjusted sorting of invoices under 'Purchase Invoices' tab so overpaid invoices show first for greater visiblity
Fixed autocomplete sorting for inventory items on forms where broken #12929
Added ability to create recurring purchase invoices #11951
Added 'Archived' checkbox to tax codes to make obsolete tax codes inactive #10791
When importing bank statement in OFX format, for amounts assume number format as set under 'Preferences' tab
Added themes from website as built-in themes (they will be marked as inactive by default)
Fixed issue where 'Notes' field wasn't cloned on payments and receipts #13205
Fixed layout issue where text would not fit allocated space #13194
Fixed issue where custom fields on sales invoices didn't clone #13093
Improved the look how custom fields are presented on forms
Removed 'Notes' field from bank and cash transaction forms (if field is in use, it will be converted to a custom field)
When copying one document type into another, copy contents of custom fields if names are identical #13253
Fixed debit/credit amounts for accounts receivable and accounts payable on 'General Ledger Summary' report #13275
Optional fields such as 'Telephone', 'Fax', 'Mobile', 'Notes' on customers, suppliers and employees have been converted into custom fields
Added ability to create custom field of a 'Date' type #12916
'Notes' field on sales quotes, sales invoices, delivery notes and purchase invoices converted into custom field #13298
Fields 'Delivery Date', 'Delivery Address', 'Delivery Instructions' and 'Authorized by' on orders to be converted to custom fields
Convert 'Notes' field on journal entries and payslips into custom field
Fixed tracking code placeholder text on depreciation and amortization forms #13355
Added ability to inject custom field by name to themes #13339
Fixed totals under 'Sales Quotes' tab when amounts on quotes are tax exclusive #13304
Fixed display of custom field on printed documents when it's a date #13553
Fixed issue with discounts so they are not copied from sales to purchase documents #13493
Prevent inventory location from being deleted if it's already in use #13684
Added 'Form Defaults' under 'Settings' tab to be able to set default values for new transactions #13914
Automatically expand width of custom field based on options in dropdown #13664
Added in-built tax codes for individual emirates within United Arab Emirates #12070
Added ability to create recurring journal entries under 'Settings' tab
Make customer and supplier statements remember date or period preferences for more streamlined workflow
Fixed 'Copy to' function on customer statement when viewing historical customer statement #12025
Fixed Dutch VAT report generation issue #13873
Fixed UK VAT report generation issue #13873
Rename title of credit note to 'Tax Credit Note' if VAT tax code of United Arab Emirates is used
Added ability to set default bank/cash account for bank/cash transactions under 'Form Defaults' #14126
Fixed ability to set theme on customer and supplier statements #14071
Fixed form defaults for cash and bank transactions so the option 'Amounts are tax inclusive' can be unchecked #14160
Added ability to view and clone inventory write-offs #3265
Improve date format detection on bank statement QIF import #14332
Added search box to 'Tracking Codes' screen #14217
Added 'Total debits' and 'Total credits' totals when viewing list of transactions on customer or supplier statements #13935
Fixed 'View' button on expense claims when viewing account transactions #14007
Added 'Delivery address' field to customers if 'Delivery Notes' tab is enabled #11829
Added ability to copy goods receipts to purchase invoices #8939
Rename 'Receipt / Payment' to 'Bank receipt / payment' or 'Cash receipt / payment' #13005
Added VAT 15% tax code for South Africa
Fixed invoice title on invoices issued from Lithuania #14469
Fixed sorting by reference for relevant tabs #14644
Fixed custom fields so they are not shown on supplier statements twice #14549
Fixed date issue when trying to update existing exchange rates #14627
When creating new reports, leave 'From' field blank rather than auto-filling with the start date #10426
Fixed issue with custom fields when converting bank account into cash account and vice versa #14535
Added ability to set up 'Early Payment Discount' on sales invoices #14956
Added ability to rename 'Profit & Loss Statement (Actual vs Budget)' report #11900
Added 'Qty to invoice' column to 'Customers' tab to see delivered items without invoice #10443
Fixed QFX import issue where XML tags are not properly closed #14285
Added 'Description' column under 'Credit Notes' tab if used
Added VAT 0% and VAT Exempt tax codes for Saudi Arabia #12135
Added automatic reference numbers to inventory write-offs #13792
Added new tax codes (8%, 10%) for Japan #13936
Added 'Description' column under 'Debit Notes' tab if used
Added ability to copy purchase invoice into debit note
Added mini-statement when viewing invoices instead of showing 'Amount credited' #15140
Fixed report export when row contained a cell with no amount #15097
Show invoice number on credit notes if applicable
Fixed dropdown issue on custom fields to prevent duplicates #14857
Sri Lankan Rupee symbol changed from 'LKR' to 'Rs.'
Fixed 'Balance due' on sales invoices if withholding tax is used #15339
Fixed rounding issue on 'Inventory Profit Margin' report #15193
Fixed incorrect count of transactions when viewing customer/supplier statements #15256
Fixed visibility issue of custom fields on line items #15270
When creating invoices and credit/debit notes, all fields are now shown upfront
Fixed 'Aged Receivables' and 'Aged Payables' reports to show figures in correct format when drilling-down #15430
Fixed 'Debit Notes' tab so it shows custom fields in the list #15428
Make invoice title 'Tax Invoice' when using GST tax code in Singapore
Fixed issue with early payment discounts when unrelated credit note is issued #15160
Fixed issue when custom theme is deleted, show default theme instead on documents which were using it #15439
Added ability to set date on customer and supplier statements to 'Today' instead of manually specifying it
Added ability to set form defaults for customers, suppliers and employees #15683
Fixed issue on invoice mini-statement so it doesn't show lines with zero amount #15707
